G

GameZone - Class in <Unnamed>
This program allows the user to select from 2 game options: 21 or rock paper scissors.
GameZone() - Constructor for class GameZone
 

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class GameZone
Main function that executes whichever game the user chooses continuously until the user enters a 3 to quit.

P

play21(Scanner, Random) - Static method in class GameZone
This function simulates a game of 21 with an infinite deck.
playRockPaperScissors(Random) - Static method in class GameZone
This function simulates a classic game of rock, paper, scissors.
printMenuAndGetChoice(Scanner) - Static method in class GameZone
This function presents a menu with 3 choices to the user and returns the integer of their choice.
printWelcome() - Static method in class GameZone
This function prints a welcome banner.
